Of Share Draft Forms, if you tell us orally, we may require that you send us your complaint or question in writing within Automatic Loan Payments, 9. $ Fees, Etc. 10 business days. We will tell you the results of our investigation within 10 business days after we hear from you 10. $ Adjusted Book Balance and will correct any error promptly. If we need more time, however, we may take up to 45 days to investigate your complaint or question. If we decide to do this, we will recredit your account within 10 business days for the amount you think is in error, so that you will have the use of the money during the time it takes us to complete your investigation. If we ask you to put your complaint or question in writing and we do not receive it within 10 business days, we may not LINE 11 TOTAL AMOUNT recredit your account. DRAFTS OUTSTANDING If we decide that there was no error, we will send you a written explanation within 3 business days after we finish our investigation. You may ask for copies of the documents that we used NOTE: LINE 6 AND 10 SHOULD AGREE in our investigation.
